decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with green devotion cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Llanowar Elves, while also utilizing cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Old-Growth Troll to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures like Cavalier of Thorns and strong spells like Invasion of Ixalan, ultimately aiming to win the match through aggressive play and efficient mana usage.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to control the game through removal spells, counterspells, and card draw, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with card advantage and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. The deck also aims to stabilize the board with sweepers like Supreme Verdict and protect its life total with cards like Dovin's Veto. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value with blink effects. The deck is well-rounded with a focus on reactive plays and long-term card advantage.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays and disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to pressure the opponent. The deck has removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with threats, while also having some card advantage with Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. Overall, the key strategy of this deck is to apply pressure early on and control the board to secure a quick victory.

This Merfolk aggro deck focuses on swarming the board with Merfolk creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes cards like Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca, Tishana's Tidebinder, and Vodalian Hexcatcher to build a strong board presence while also using cards like Collected Company to quickly refill the board with more creatures. With a mix of aggressive creatures and support cards, the deck aims to establish dominance on the battlefield early and maintain pressure throughout the game to secure a victory.
